Title: Dyson V7 Advanced Cordless Vacuum Cleaner | Silver | New
Description:
The Dyson V7 Advanced cordless vacuum cleaner is engineered with the power, versatility and run time to clean your whole home. Dyson’s de-tangling Motorbar™ cleaner head deep cleans carpets and hard floors with hair removal vanes that clear long hair and pet hair from the brush bar. The Dyson V7 has advanced, whole-machine filtration that captures pet allergens and fine dust, expelling cleaner air. Thanks to the cordless format, it also transforms into a handheld vacuum with one click so you can clean up high, down low and everywhere in-between. Comes with a 2-year warranty and lifetime Dyson support.
¹Actual run time will vary based on power mode and/or attachments used. ²In Max mode. All other modes achieve at least 99.97% filtration. Washable filter can be reused for the lifetime of the machine, reducing waste.

Title: Dyson Big Ball Turbinehead Canister Vacuum | Yellow/Iron | New
Description:
The Dyson Big Ball Turbinehead has powerful Dyson suction to remove hair and dirt from every floor type. Self-righting technology Dyson Big Ball canister vacuums are monostatic: they have a single stable resting point. Dyson engineers made this possible using a complex configuration of the vacuum’s components. By assembling them in a spherical array, with the heaviest components near the floor, we created a curved body with a low center of gravity. This means that whenever the vacuum is displaced from its resting position, gravitational force will automatically return it. Or more simply, when it’s knocked over, it gets back up. Dyson Big Ball canister vacuums feature a new bin emptying mechanism so you can hygienically drive out trapped dust and debris with just the push of a button. With advanced whole-machine filtration and 4 additional tools for versatile tasks, the Turbinehead tool automatically raises and lowers to seal in suction across carpets, rugs, and hard floors. Articulated handle for easy, versatile cleaning the wand’s handle rotates in three directions, allowing 360° articulation for greater control.

In the box: Quick-release articulating hard floor tool, Quick-release combination tool, Stair tool, Tangle-free Turbine head.

Important Note: To maintain optimal suction power, clean the filter and cylindrical HEPA frequently. Neglecting to clean can cause debris to block the vents, resulting in a loss of suction.
Maintenance Tips:
1. Always use the original adapter to charge the cordless vacuum.
2. Clean the HEPA filter and other filters regularly and ensure they are completely dry before reinstallation to maintain strong suction.
3. Confirm that the brush head, dust cup, and filter are correctly installed before use.
4. Avoid using the stick vacuum cleaner on wet surfaces.

Description:

Model Name: Whall Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
Item Size: 9.84"L x 6.69"W x 44.49"H

🎁Key Features
【Advanced Motor, Continuous Power】The cordless vacuum cleaner adopts a high-end brushless motor, delivering a true 280W high power with an effective suction of up to 25Kpa. It has multiple modes, allowing you to adjust the suction power according to the amount of dust, choosing the appropriate usage time and cleaning efficiency. The unique cyclonic filtration system ensures a longer-lasting suction power without fading.
【Removable Large Battery, Longer Running Time】The cordless vacuum cleaner has 7-cell large capacity battery, providing up to 55 minutes of cleaning time in the 1st mode (6.5kPa), and 12 minutes of deep cleaning in the maximum mode (25kPa). Three charging methods: ① Can be charged on the wall mount. ② Can be charged with an adapter. ③ The battery can be removed and charged separately, providing more options.
【Efficient Filtration, Rejecting Secondary Pollution】The cordless vacuum cleaner features a 5-level cyclonic separation system, efficiently separating dust and cleaning up to 99.99% of fine dust. An additional HEPA filter at the air outlet prevents odors and secondary pollution. The HEPA filter is recommended for regular cleaning and replacement, it's reusable. With a single click, the dust cup can be emptied without dirtying your hands.
【Simplified Large Screen, Easy to Use】The cordless vacuum cleaner uses a simpler large screen to display key information about the battery and suction power. It is controlled by an intelligent chip and has a simple button design, making it easier to operate. It can be easily seen and used by both children and the elderly. Additionally, we provide an extra HEPA filter as a gift.
【Flexible Cleaning, More Convenient to Use】The cordless vacuum cleaner adopts a folding tube design, making it easier to clean under tables and beds; the V-shaped BIG motorized brush + LED lighting leaves no place for dust to hide; the anti-static design at the handle makes cleaning safer. The wall-mounted charging design saves space (Note: The charging base can also be placed not on the wall)

Description: iFLOOR 3 saves you time by combining two chores – vacuuming and mopping – in one step, leaving you with shiny, clean floors. Description: The ECOVACS DEEBOT X2 OMNI robot cleaner is a giant leap forward for robot vacuums. This robot vacuum cleaner has a slimmer square-shaped design that offers better edge cleaning, cornering, and maneuvering under low clearance areas and around obstacles. Add in automatic mop lifting and enhanced learning capability, and you'll quickly discover why it's able to go where no robot vacuum has gone before. This vacuum mop's powerful 8,000 PA suction power means even small debris won't escape its cleaning power. The industry-first dual-laser LiDAR navigation is fully enclosed into the body of the DEEBOT. This gives the DEEBOT X2 OMNI a sleek low profile along with faster mapping, quicker responsiveness, and greater cleaning accuracy. When your floors are sparkling clean, your robot vacuum and mop returns to its OMNI station to empty the dustbin, wash its mop with hot water, and dry it with hot air. Keeping your floors, and your to-do list, clean.
